sentences: Sam Allen (January 30, 1909 â€“ April 1963) was an American jazz pianist.
Allen was born in Middleport, Ohio.
In 1928 he moved to New York City, where he joined Herbert Cowans's band at the Rockland Palace.
Before long he moved back to Ohio, where he played with saxophonist Alex Jackson in 1930.
In the 1940s he worked with Stuff Smith, Dizzy Gillespie, and became pianist for Slim & Slam.
